name: opencodebox.org/graphrisk
description: GraphRisk is  an attempt to map an IT ecosystem and the data flows between systems (Data Journey in GDPR language). The project succeeded the initial scope of mapping the data journey within Photobox and gave insight to the governance and risk teams on how to use a graph data base to inspect data flows between systems.

suggest.ext-iconv: To handle non UTF-8 CSV files (if "php-intl" is not already installed or is too limited)
suggest.ext-intl: To handle non UTF-8 CSV files (if "iconv" is not already installed)
